description: Prior approval for a change of use of the second and third floors from commercial (use class E) to six self-contained residential units (use class C3).
decision_conditions: <p>The development hereby approved under Class MA must be completed within a period of 3 years starting with the prior approval date.</p><p><br></p><p>REASON: In accordance with condition MA.2 (5) of Schedule 2, Part 3, Class MA of the The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015.</p>

<p>Full details of soundproofing measures between the first and third floors shall be submitted to and approved by the Local Planning Authority, in writing before the relevant works on site commence, and the approved details shall be installed to the satisfaction of the LPA and retained thereafter.</p><p><br></p><p>REASON: To ensure that future occupiers do not suffer a loss of amenity by reason of noise nuisance and other excess noise from activities within the premises.</p>

<p>Before the first occupation of the development hereby approved, provision of eight long-stay covered, secure and accessible cycle parking spaces and two short-stay cycle parking spaces shall be made available and retained thereafter.&nbsp;</p><p><br></p><p>REASON: To ensure that adequate, reasonable and permanent provision is made within the site for the safe and secure storage of bicycles is made for future occupiers in the interest of relieving safeguarding highway safety.</p>

<p>The development hereby permitted to be used as a dwellinghouse is to remain in use as a dwellinghouse within the meaning of Class C3 of the Schedule to the Use Classes Order and for no other purpose, except to the extent that the other purpose is ancillary to the use as a dwellinghouse.<br></p><p><br></p><p>REASON: In accordance with condition MA.2 (6) of Schedule 2, Part 3, Class MA of the The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015.</p>
